TheWord.ScriptureReference: Luke 1:6, Genesis 16:8, 2 Chronicles 23, Lamentations 3, Revelation 1:15, Genesis 30:20, Daniel 1, 1 Chronicles 1, Hebrews 13:10
TheWord.Title: As You know Me God, as I know You LORD. The man has kept quiet on everything, except what is essentially God's provision.

BibleWord.Commentary: They were both righteous before God, walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless (Luke 1:6).

AlphabetSequence.Word: As You know Me God, as I know You LORD.
The man has kept quiet on everything, except what is essentially God's provision.

CaseBasedReasoning.Commentary: Highway 880 North 84 West fly flys towards the left. The man has kept quiet on everything except what is essentially God's (write: black dog barks from the right). SELECT * FROM AlphabetSequence WHERE (Dated >= '20030823') ORDER (fly flys from the keyboard). Faeces: running. Shower. Faeces: running. Shower.

ClassAssociates.Commentary: SELECT scriptureReferenceWithoutBracket FROM BIBLE..KJV WHERE CHARINDEX('Know', verseText) > 0 AND CHARINDEX('God', verseText) > 0 AND CHARINDEX('LORD', verseText) > 0 AND CHARINDEX('God', verseText) < CHARINDEX('LORD', verseText) ORDER BY verseIdSequence: Exodus 6:7, 1 Kings 17:24, 1 Kings 20:28, 1 Chronicles 28:9, Isaiah 40:28, Hosea 5:4, Acts 2:36, 2 Corinthians 11:31, Ephesians 1:17, 2 Thessalonians 1:8, 2 Timothy 2:19, 2 Peter 1:2.
